plugins.name: StackCraft Copilot
plugins.description: AI-powered website tech stack analyzer with intelligent prompt engineering. Detects frameworks, libraries, and architecture patterns from any live website.

features: Intelligent prompt engineering with Prompt Sage agent

Dual-mode experience: Guided analysis & Quick analysis
